attributes.additional_details:
Please read my manifesto:

•	That every member of the UK should be willing to live and let live in peace
•	That every member should have freedom of speech
•	That every member should have freedom of religion
•	That every member should respect UK democratically constructed law
•	That no member should be intolerant of other members or encourage others to be so

This is what I believe and I am a member of the United Kingdom of Great Britain
